sentences.sContent: More of our children should be able to look up at night and see that the Milky Way is not just a candy bar .
sentences.sCn: 我们应该有更多的孩子能够仰望夜空，眼中所看到的银河不应仅仅只是（模糊的）“一条糖块”而已。

sentences.sContent: We live in a galaxy of other stars; the Milky Way is not merely a glowing cloud but what we have come to call a galaxy, an island universe.
sentences.sCn: 我们存在于由其它恒星组成的一个星系中，银河不再仅仅是一朵发光的云，而是必须被称作星系，它是一个岛宇宙。

sentences.sContent: Annihilating dark matter at the heart of the Milky Way could account for signals detected by two space telescopes, according to a pair of US physicists.
sentences.sCn: 据两位美国物理学家称，银河中心暗物质湮灭的这一设想，可以解释近年来两台空间望远镜探测到的信号。
